thread.title: Kim Kardashian West Is Ditching Bodycon Dressing For a Cozy New Look
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian West Is Ditching Bodycon Dressing For a Cozy New Look

title: Kim Kardashian West Is Ditching Bodycon Dressing For a Cozy New Look
text: Kim Kardashian West Is Ditching Body-Con Dressing for a Cozy New Look February 9, 2017 12:56 AM by Edward Barsamian Photo: AKM_GSI It's funny to think that Kim Kardashian West, a woman whose body was made for figure-hugging clothes, is now championing the track pant. That said, the sporty pieces she's been wearing from her husband’s Adidas Calabasas collection and the Adidas Originals are hardly sloppy, as evidenced by the look she wore while filming in the Los Angeles area earlier today. Kardashian West’s biker-jacket game is strong—she has a statement version featuring a painted image of herself , Enfants Riches Déprimés’s studded style , and of course a traditional version from BLK DNM —and it helped set the directional tone of the look. Kardashian West has been experimenting with high-low dressing with casual undertones since at least the start of 2017 , and today she took that idea up a notch. The undone henley was an everyday touch, while coordinating heeled booties stepped up the ladylike factor. Kim Kardashian and Kanye West on Eating Reindeer at Met Gala 2016: In This Story: Kim Kardashian West Recommended For You
